parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description:
The order in which details of events are to be retrieved. Valid values:

*   FORWARD: ascending order.
*   BACKWARD: descending order. This is the default value.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The default time is the current time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries to be returned.

Valid values: 0 to 50.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token used to request the next page of query results.

> The request parameters must be the same as those of the last request.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The default time is seven days prior to the current time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` format. The time must be in UTC.
